remarks:
An inference from a nested biconditional, related to modus ponens. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Oct-2012.)

 An inference from a nested biconditional, related to modus ponens. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Oct-2012.)
statement:
mpbiri.min $e |- ch $.
mpbiri.maj $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
mpbiri $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
